summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transaction details for a Deutsche Bank account from May 1, 2018, to May 31, 2018. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and ending balances, highlighting various preauthorized debits and credits.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is associated with the account detailed in the document, which includes various transactions and balances.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $252,504.30 on May 1, 2018.
The ending balance as of May 31, 2018, was $195,268.45.
Multiple preauthorized debits were made, including payroll fees and health insurance premiums.
There were service charges totaling $50.00 for the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors related to electronic funds transfers.
